AT.name: Citizens of Earth
AT.description: Du wurdest gerade zum Vizepräsidenten der Welt gewählt... Und was jetzt? Gewinne deine Freunde, Verwandten und jedermann sonst in der Stadt, dir zur Seite zu stehen und deine Schlachten für dich zu schlagen! In diesem modernen auf alt getrimmten Rollenspiel bist du gerade zu einem kurzen aus Steuergeldern finanzierten Urlaub von deinen Wahlkampfreisen zurückgekehrt... um zu sehen, dass alles aus den Fugen geraten ist! DU allein verfügst über die Ausstrahlung, die nötig ist, um die ganze Drecksarbeit zu delegieren und die Welt zu retten. Also, frag' nicht, was du für deine Landsleute tun kannst, frag', was deine Landsleute für dich tun können!

AU.name: Citizens of Earth
AU.description: You've just been elected as Vice President of the World... So what now? Recruit your friends, your family, and everyone else around town to join your party and fight your battles! In this modern-day retro-RPG, you have returned home from the campaign trails for a little taxpayer-funded vacation... to find things have gone mad! Only YOU have the charisma it takes to delegate all the dirty work and save the world. So don't ask what you can do for your countrymen...Ask what your countrymen can do for you!

BG.name: Citizens of Earth
BG.description: You've just been elected as Vice President of the World... So what now? Recruit your friends, your family, and everyone else around town to join your party and fight your battles! Only YOU have the charisma it takes to delegate all the dirty work and save the world. So don't ask what you can do for your countrymen...Ask what your countrymen can do for you!

BE.name: Citizens of Earth
BE.description: Vous venez d'être élu vice-président du monde... Et après ? Recrutez vos amis, et même vos voisins pour combattre à vos côtés ! Dans ce RPG au style rétro complètement déjanté, VOUS SEUL avez le charisme qu'il faut pour déléguer le sale boulot et sauver le monde. Ne vous demandez pas ce que vous pourrez faire pour vos citoyens... Demandez-vous plutôt ce qu'ils pourront faire pour vous !

ES.name: Citizens of Earth
ES.description: Acaban de proclamarte vicepresidente del mundo... Y ahora, ¿qué? ¡Recluta a tus amigos, a tu familia y a toda la gente del pueblo para que se unan a tu equipo y luchen en tus batallas! En este RPG retro pero a la vez moderno, regresas a casa tras la travesía electoral para disfrutar de unas pequeñas vacaciones pagadas por los contribuyentes... ¡para encontrarte que todo está patas arriba! Solo TÚ posees el carisma necesario para delegar todo el trabajo sucio y salvar el mundo. Así que no preguntes qué puedes hacer por tus compatriotas... ¡Pregunta qué pueden hacer tus compatriotas por ti!

Only YOU have the charisma it takes to delegate all the dirty work and save the world. So don't ask what you can do for your countrymen...Ask what your countrymen can do for you!

IT.name: Citizens of Earth
IT.description: Sei stato appena scelto come Vice-presidente del Mondo... E ora? Recluta i tuoi amici, la tua famiglia, e chiunque altro della città per unirsi al tuo partito e combattere le tue battaglie! In questo GDR retro moderno, sei tornato a casa dagli appuntamenti della campagna per le elezioni per una piccola vacanza pagata dai tassati dello stato... per scoprire che tutti sono impazziti! Solo TU hai il carisma necessario per delegare tutto il lavoro sporco e salvare il mondo. Quindi non chiedere che cosa puoi fare per i tuoi concittadini...chiedi che cosa i concittadini possono fare per te!

Only YOU have the charisma it takes to delegate all the dirty work and save the world. So don't ask what you can do for your countrymen...Ask what your countrymen can do for you!

NL.name: Citizens of Earth
NL.description: Je bent net tot Vicepresident van de wereld gekozen ... Dus wat nu? Rekruteer je vrienden, je familie en iedereen in de buurt en in die je maar kent om ook aan jouw kant te komen staan en je oorlogen te bevechten! In deze hedendaagse retro-RPG ben je net thuis van campagne voeren om van een welverdiende, door de belastingbetaler bekostigde vakantie te genieten .... om erachter te komen dat de vlam in de pan is geslagen! JIJ hebt als enige het charisma dat nodig is om al het vuile werk te delegeren en de wereld te redden. Dus vraag niet wat jij voor je landgenoten kunt doen... Vraag wat je landgenoten voor jou kunnen doen!

NZ.name: Citizens of Earth
NZ.description: You've just been elected as Vice President of the World... So what now? Recruit your friends, your family, and everyone else around town to join your party and fight your battles! In this modern-day retro-RPG, you have returned home from the campaign trails for a little taxpayer-funded vacation... to find things have gone mad! Only YOU have the charisma it takes to delegate all the dirty work and save the world. So don't ask what you can do for your countrymen...Ask what your countrymen can do for you!

PL.name: Citizens of Earth
PL.description: You've just been elected as Vice President of the World... So what now? Recruit your friends, your family, and everyone else around town to join your party and fight your battles! In this modern-day retro-RPG, you have returned home from the campaign trails for a little taxpayer-funded vacation... to find things have gone mad! Only YOU have the charisma it takes to delegate all the dirty work and save the world. So don't ask what you can do for your countrymen...Ask what your countrymen can do for you!

PT.name: Citizens of Earth
PT.description: Acabas de ser eleito Vice-Presidente do Mundo... E agora? Recruta os amigos, familiares e habitantes para a festa e para a luta! Neste jogo retro de RPG actual, acabas de regressar de umas férias patrocinadas pelo dinheiro dos contribuintes... e descobres que está tudo louco! Só TU tens o carisma necessário para delegar o trabalho sujo para salvar o mundo. Não te perguntes o que é que podes fazer pelos teus concidadãos... Pergunta-te o que é que os teus concidadãos podem fazer por ti!

RU.name: Citizens of Earth
RU.description: Тебя только что избрали вице-президентом мира. Так что же теперь? Завербуй своих друзей, членов семьи и каждого в городе сражаться за тебя! В этой современной ролевой ретро-игре ты возвращаешься с предвыборной кампании, чтобы немного провести каникулы за счет налогоплательщиков, но ... все смешалось! И только ТЫ обладаешь обаянием, которое необходимо, чтобы организвать грязную работу и спасти мир. Не спрашивай, что сделать для своих земляков... Спроси, что земляки могут сделать для тебя!

SE.name: Citizens of Earth
SE.description: You've just been elected as Vice President of the World... So what now? Recruit your friends, your family, and everyone else around town to join your party and fight your battles!
